title: 107_hr3631
content: Wider Incentives for Non-Gasoline Small Electric Vehicles Act of 2002 or the WINGS EV Act of 2002 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code, concerning the electric motor vehicle credit, to: (1) redefine the term qualified electric vehicle, (2) increase the credit according to vehicle type. (3) make the credit available for leased vehicles and three wheeled vehicles, and (4) extend the credit three additional years.
